roomDescription: The package we're famous for, our Beach Suite gives you everything you need for your home away from home during your stay. The suites come with a single queen-sized bed, walk-in tub with jacuzzi jets, and world-class room service always there when you need them. Let your troubles melt away!

amenities.amenityImgAlt: This room comes with a queen bed, available in both memory foam and natural latex beds (upon request).
Enjoy free continental breakfast and unlimited coffee refills during your stay!
This room comes equipped with a 62" OLED TV with access to many streaming services!

roomDescription: The family that stays together saves together! Enjoy the same amenities as our Beach Suite rooms and two queen-sized beds to make sure everyone gets enough shuteye. Comes with a free diner coupon worth $25!

amenities.amenityImgAlt: This room comes with 2 double beds, either memory foam or latex (available upon request). Enjoy twice the amount of luxury!
Enjoy free continental breakfast and unlimited coffee refills during your stay!
This room comes equipped with a 62" OLED TV with access to many streaming services!

roomDescription: All of the room and comfort of all our other rooms, but with a warm and inviting wood interior and lush green garden patio to help you unwind. Meditate in the garden or pour yourself a glass of complimentary champagne from the fridge, you've earned this.

amenities.amenityImgAlt: This room comes with 2 double beds, either memory foam or latex (available upon request). Enjoy twice the amount of luxury!
Enjoy free continental breakfast and unlimited coffee refills during your stay!
This room comes equipped with a 62" OLED TV with access to many streaming services!
This room comes with complimentary alcohol in the minifridge! (Must present valid ID upon check-in)
A personal garden filled with greenery and peaceful art, maintained daily. Hot towels available upon request!
In addition to our standard world-class room service, enjoy a special menu and complimentary meals on us!

roomDescription: This room is available in multiple styles! Our Fresh & Clean and Love Study rooms are currently available to book for you and your partner's delight. Unwind in our luxuriant honeymoon suites with complimentary champagne and 25% off of a steak dinner for two.

amenities.amenityImgAlt: This room comes with 2 double beds, either memory foam or latex (available upon request). Enjoy twice the amount of luxury!
Enjoy free continental breakfast and unlimited coffee refills during your stay!
This room comes equipped with a 62" OLED TV with access to many streaming services!
This room comes with complimentary alcohol in the minifridge! (Must present valid ID upon check-in)
In addition to our standard world-class room service, enjoy a special menu and complimentary meals on us!
